name: Tommy Westphall
bio: Tommy Westphall, possibly the lead brain, contains most of the televised world within the confines of his cerebellum.

name: Bob Newhart
bio: The central character of The Bob Newhart Show, as played by Bob Newhart.

messages.quote: We'll take over the world. The globe, evennnnn!
notes: Researchers where unable to transcribe the tone in which this message was said, but we all know it.

name: John Munch
bio: A detective so good he passes through the fourth wall to reach other TV serials.

name: Benny Russell
bio: Alter ego of Deep Space Nine's Command Sisko that lives as a science-fiction writer in 1950's America.

messages.quote: I created it, and it's REAL!

name: Credit Human
bio: Looks and sounds like the human it aspires to be. Good rates.

name: Unknown Flamethrower-laden Robot
bio: Brain unknown, but definitely has a flamethrower attached.

name: Nyquil Jeff Goldblum
bio: The personality of Jeff Goldblum that surfaces when Chris Remo has ingested Nyquil and dozed off.

name: The Brain Wearing Arnold's Skin
bio: To ensure the highest resale value, this brain wears Arnold Schwarzenegger's skin so it can be sold as 'pre-worn'.

messages.quote: The worst thing I can be is the same as everybody else. I hate that.
